ygData.subject: Hello all items for sale
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail to all, I am Xeones, a 12th level Paladin of Mithaniel Marr.  I can be found in and about Freeport and the surrounding countryside. I have a few items for
ygData.messageBody:
Hail to all, I am Xeones, a 12th level Paladin of Mithaniel Marr. I can be found in and about Freeport and the surrounding countryside.

I have a few items for sale which i have picked up in my travels which may be of interest. Firstly, i usually have Cutthroat insignia rings on hand. These are magical items, adding +2 to dex and 1 to ac. Two can be worn at once, adding +4 to your dexterity. These are also a monk quest item, by the way. These go for 1 plat a piece.

I also have 1 bronze main gauche, a piercing weapon that can be used even by wizards. A very fast weapon, does 3 dmg with 23 atk delay. I'm asking 4 plat for this rare item.

In addition, a bronze rapier, with 4 dmg & 28 delay. I'm asking 5 plat for this one.

If you see me on, send me a tell. If i don't have a ring currently, i'm sure one of my companions will, and would be happy to sell one to you.

Happy travels all,
Xeones
<hr size=1><b>Do You Yahoo!?</b><br>Get your free @... address at <a href="http://mail.yahoo.com/">Yahoo! Mail</a>.<br>
